entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this morning. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
